Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu

Class UserData

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.UserData
public class UserData
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for handling user data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UserData()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addStudent​(Student student)
    Adds a student to the list.
    static void clear()
    Clears all students from memory
    static Student findCurrentStudent()
    Returns the current student from the list.
    static Student getCurrent()
    Returns the currently logged in student.
    static java.util.List<Student> getStudents()
    Returns the list of students.
    static boolean isStudentAlready​(java.lang.String studentNumber)
    Checks if a student already exists.
    static void readFromJson()
    Reads the students.json file and creates the list of students based on its contents.
    If the file's not found, prints out students.json file not found.
    static void removeStudent​(java.lang.String studentNumber)
    Removes a student from the list.
    static void setCurrent​(Student student)
    Sets the currently logged in student.
    static void writeToJson()
    Writes students to the students.json file.
    The file is saved into the Sisu folder.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clears all students from memory

    • setCurrent

      public static void setCurrent​(Student student)
      Sets the currently logged in student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be set.

    • getCurrent

      public static Student getCurrent()
      Returns the currently logged in student.
      Returns:
      The currently logged in student.

    • addStudent

      public static void addStudent​(Student student)
      Adds a student to the list.
      Parameters:
      student - Student to be added.

    • removeStudent

      public static void removeStudent​(java.lang.String studentNumber)
      Removes a student from the list.
      Parameters:
      studentNumber - Student number referring to the student to be removed.

    • isStudentAlready

      public static boolean isStudentAlready​(java.lang.String studentNumber)
      Checks if a student already exists.
      Parameters:
      studentNumber - Student number of the student.
      Returns:
      True if student was found, false if not.

    • findCurrentStudent

      public static Student findCurrentStudent()
      Returns the current student from the list.
      Returns:
      The current student from the list.

    • getStudents

      public static java.util.List<Student> getStudents()
      Returns the list of students.
      Returns:
      The list of students.

    • readFromJson

      public static void readFromJson()
      Reads the students.json file and creates the list of students based on its contents.
      If the file's not found, prints out students.json file not found.

    • writeToJson

      public static void writeToJson() throws java.io.IOException
      Writes students to the students.json file.
      The file is saved into the Sisu folder.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
